an8.81:1.1: “Satisampajanne, bhikkhave, asati satisampajannavipannassa hatupanisam hoti hirottappam.
an8.81:1.2: Hirottappe asati hirottappavipannassa hatupaniso hoti indriyasamvaro.
an8.81:1.3: Indriyasamvare asati indriyasamvaravipannassa hatupanisam hoti silam.
an8.81:1.4: Sile asati silavipannassa hatupaniso hoti sammasamadhi.
an8.81:1.5: Sammasamadhimhi asati sammasamadhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti yathabhutananadassanam.
an8.81:1.6: Yathabhutananadassane asati yathabhutananadassanavipannassa hatupaniso hoti nibbidavirago.
an8.81:1.7: Nibbidavirage asati nibbidaviragavipannassa hatupanisam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an8.81:1.8: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, rukkho sakhapalasavipanno. Tassa papatikapi na paripurim gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … saropi na paripurim gacchati.
an8.81:1.9: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, satisampajanne asati satisampajannavipannassa hatupanisam hoti hirottappam;
an8.81:2.1: Satisampajanne, bhikkhave, sati satisampajannasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti hirottappam.
an8.81:2.2: Hirottappe sati hirottappasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti indriyasamvaro.
an8.81:2.3: Indriyasamvare sati indriyasamvarasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti silam.
an8.81:2.4: Sile sati silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammasamadhi.
an8.81:2.5: Sammasamadhimhi sati sammasamadhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti yathabhutananadassanam.
an8.81:2.6: Yathabhutananadassane sati yathabhutananadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidavirago.
an8.81:2.7: Nibbidavirage sati nibbidaviragasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an8.81:2.8: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, rukkho sakhapalasasampanno. Tassa papatikapi paripurim gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … saropi paripurim gacchati.
an8.81:2.9: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, satisampajanne sati satisampajannasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti hirottappam;
